::DrillBit::

He sees Grimler, Jackle, and Nighteyes run off.
"Dont follow, they are trying to split us up. They would have little
trouble then!"
He runs to Dollen.
"He isn't severly wounded, he must be out of energon."

OOC: I made a mistake earlier with Hot Rod. He couldn't get into the CF
with the lockdown, so I'll revise.

::Hot Rod::

He goes after Unitron, but finds himself locked out. 'At least Unitron,
Firestarter, and Demolition wont be able to escape,' he thinks.
